Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The main class representing the game.
Author:
Ahmad Shakleya

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Game getInstance(AbstractFactory abstractFactory)
      Get the singleton instance of the Game class.
      Parameters:
      abstractFactory - The abstract factory to use for creating game entities.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the Game class.

    • run

      public void run()
      Main game loop.

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame()
      Draw and update the game entities and systems.

    • updateEntities

      public void updateEntities()
      Updates the entities in the game. This method updates the game entities by invoking various update methods, including collision updates, movement updates, bonus updates, barrier updates, player bullet updates, enemy updates, player updates, and enemy bullet updates.

    • drawEntities

      public void drawEntities()
      Draw/render the game entities.

    • updateBonus

      public void updateBonus()
      Updates the bonuses in the game. If there are no bonuses, invokes the bonusShine() method. Otherwise, checks each bonus for reaching the end or being dead, removes dead bonuses from the game objects, and updates the bonus lists and collision system accordingly.

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer()
      Updates the player in the game. Checks each player for being dead, removes dead players from the game objects, and updates the player lists, movement system, input system, and game state accordingly.

    • updateBarrier

      public void updateBarrier()
      Updates the barriers in the game. Checks each barrier for being destroyed, removes destroyed barriers from the game objects, and updates the barrier list and collision system accordingly.

    • updatePlayerBullets

      public void updatePlayerBullets()
      Updates the player bullets in the game. Handles bullet creation, updates the bullet list, and updates the collision systems. Removes dead bullets from the game objects and adjusts the bullet lists and collision systems accordingly.

    • updateEnemies

      public void updateEnemies()
      Updates the enemy entities in the game. Handles enemy movement, checks if enemies have reached the end, updates player health when enemies reach the end, removes dead enemies from the game objects, and loads a new level if all enemies are defeated.

    • updateEnemyBullet

      public void updateEnemyBullet()
      Updates the enemy bullet entities in the game. Handles enemy firing, removes bullets that have reached the end or are marked as dead, and clears the enemy bullet objects when there are no more active bullets.

    • updateMovements

      public void updateMovements()
      Updates the movements of various entities in the game. This includes updating the movement of bonuses, players, player bullets, enemies, and enemy bullets.

    • updateCollisions

      public void updateCollisions()
      Updates the collisions between entities in the game. This includes detecting and handling collisions between player bullets and bonuses, player bullets and enemies, enemy bullets and barriers, and enemy bullets and players. Updates the game state and entity properties accordingly.

    • bonusShine

      public void bonusShine()
      Triggers the appearance of a bonus in the game. Randomly generates a bonus type (+ or -) and positions it within the player's screen width. Updates the game state and entity properties accordingly.

    • enemyFire

      public void enemyFire()
      Handles enemy firing behavior in the game. Randomly selects an enemy to fire based on the current level. Determines the probability of firing based on the level. Creates enemy bullets and updates the game state and entity properties accordingly.

    • updateGameObjects

      public void updateGameObjects(AbstractFigure abstractFigure)
      Adds an AbstractFigure object to the gameObjects list.
      Parameters:
      abstractFigure - The AbstractFigure object to add.

    • removeGameObjects

      public void removeGameObjects(AbstractFigure abstractFigure)
      Removes an AbstractFigure object from the gameObjects list.
      Parameters:
      abstractFigure - The AbstractFigure object to remove.
